member.name: DML_TENSOR_DESC
member.summary: A generic container for a DirectML tensor description.

member.name: DML_TENSOR_DESC.Type
member.summary: The type of the tensor description. See for the available types.

member.name: DML_TENSOR_DESC.Desc
member.summary: A pointer to the tensor description. The type of the pointed-to struct must match the value specified in Type.
